Title: SpinDotters - Spinning controls for the .NET framework
Description:
SpinDotters provides a set of animated controls for the following .NET technologies:

* Silverlight (version 4 or higher)
* WPF (version 4 higher)
* Windows Phone (version 7.5 or higher)

There is only one common code base for both XAML and code-behind, with a few
compiler switches where necessary.

SpinDotters comes with two assemblies:

* SpinDotters.Core: The core assembly with a set of basic spinning controls
* SpinDotters.Widgets: A set of fancy user controls for demo purposes

Bug reports and any kind of feedback are appreciated!
